Description: SMARTFLY P116 Silicon Waterproof 3D Pedometer Watch 10000steps Counter Outdoor F Main Functions -PC Software with Multi-User Support -3D Sensor for enhanced Step Count -30 Days Total Work Out Memory -Time Display -Support 12/24 Hour Display Format -Track Step, Distance and Calculate Calories Burned Accurately -Exercise Timer/Alarm Specifications: Operating Temperature.: 0℃ to 40℃ Storage Temperature.: -20℃ to 60℃ Step Accuracy: ±5% Time Accuracy: ±15 seconds Dimension: 45*40*20mm Step range: up to 999,999 steps Distance range: up to 999,999 KM or miles Calories range: up to 99,999.9 kcal Feature: Step mode -Display number of steps taken. Distance mode -Display distance traveled. Calories mode -Display calories consumed. Exercise Time mode -Display total exercise time you did. Daily Memory mode -Can browse your past 30 days walking workout. Alarm mode -Optional function for 2 alarm to go off at the user's expected time Total Memory mode -Can browse your total walking workout since last data reset. What's in the Box Pedometer x 1 Silicon Slap Strap x 1 Lanyard x 1 USB Line x 1 Instruction manual x 1 · ACCURATE TRACKING - Silent 3D Advanced Tri Axis walk sensor technology. Unlike pedometers that use a pendulum design, it won't miscount steps and you can position it anywhere - on your hand ,on your hip, in a pocket or a bag using the included security strap.· MONITOR - Measures daily step count, distance travelled and calorie counter - units can be imperial (mile, inch, lb) or metric (km, cm, kg) - set your stride length and weight for accurate personal readings.· TARGETS - Set your daily step target, with progress bar for easy viewing and LED and beep indicator when you reach your daily target. Activity fitness tracker shows your daily active time while walking.· 30-DAY MEMORY - Automatically stores up to 30 days of activity so you can keep motivated and track your progress. The pedometer automatically resets at midnight so you can easily track your DAILY steps, distance and activity.· SMALL & LIGHT - Easy to wear and compact. Highly Accurate. Works Vertically or Horizontally. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.
